questions.question: A direct impact that the printing press had on 16th-century Europe was that it encouraged the
Which conclusion about Incan society could be drawn from the map?

choices.answer: An extensive road system connected all parts of the empire
Their trade depended on many seaports
Tropical climate conditions existed throughout the empire
A similar language unified the Inca civilization

questions.question: Which technological advancement helped unify both the Roman and Inca Empires?
The astrolabe and the Mercator projection were technological advances that contributed to

choices.answer: exploration and overseas expansion of the colonial empires
unification of Germany and Italy in the late 1800's
growth of industry in Latin America during the late 1900's
spread of Islam in the 700's and 800's

questions.question: During World War I, developments in military technology led to

choices.answer: an early victory by the Allied powers
the use of poisonous gas and submarine attacks
an increase in ethnic tension in western Europe

questions.question: Which technology contributed most directly to the success of the Protestant Reformation?
In India, for which achievement is the Gupta Golden Age best known?

choices.answer: invention of the iron foot stirrup
development of the concept of zero

questions.question: A key reason the Incas were able to control their large empire was that they

choices.answer: built a road system to connect distant areas and move armies
promoted literacy and mass education programs

questions.question: Which revolution led to increase in global food production as a result of pesticides?
What was an important strategy used by both the Romans and Incas to unify the empires?

choices.answer: building a large network of roads and bridges
using powerful navies to protect sea trade routes
supporting free-market economies by minting silver coins
granting citizenship and voting rights to conquered peoples

questions.question: The impact of the printing press/astrolabe on 16th century Europe demonstrates that technology

choices.answer: limits which ideas can be transmitted
can redefine human understanding of the world
can exploit new sources of energy

questions.question: Which technology enabled European navigators to determine their location while exploring?
Which current global problem was initiated with the development of atomic weapons?

choices.answer: threats to peace from unrestricted nuclear proliferation
increased health risks from industrial pollution
elevated carbon dioxide in the atmosphere from deforestation
changes in world weather patterns due to melting ice caps

questions.question: A long-term effect of Gutenberg's printing press was that the

choices.answer: monarchies were restored to absolute power
development of new ideas was discouraged

questions.question: Which culture is credited with the development of gunpowder, the abacus, and the compass?
